title: Regal Art & Gift Wireless Flower Lantern, Sunburst
features: Patent Pending design combines beauty and functionality. This unique lantern features a waterproof wireless speaker housed in the center of a colorful metallic flower
BUILT-IN WATERPROOF SPEAKER: Wireless transmission with 30 foot range and quality sound that plays up to 6 hours
SPECIAL LIGHT FEATURES: Removable speaker has a LED light in the center that features 3 modes: 1) Solid white light; 2) Gradual color-changing light; or 3) Color-changing and pulsating with music
HANGING/TABLETOP FUNCTIONALITY: Chains and hook make is easy to hang on patios, pergolas and trees. Or remove the chains and turn flower over to make into a tabletop musical light show
Individually packed in a full color box and makes it a great gift! 6.75"Lx6.75"Wx21''H
description: Regal Art & Gift Exclusive! - Beauty and functionality are combined in our Sunburst Wireless Speaker Flower Lantern. Metal is artfully laser-cut for this bloom's petals creating a beautiful light play at night while you play music. Easy to hang in overhead pergolas and trellises. The center of this large decorative flower houses a waterproof speaker that plays music outdoors from your smart phone, laptop, or any other Bluetooth enabled device. The speaker interacts with your music and emits colored LED lights that change and pulsate to the music. This speaker has a wireless transmission with a 30 ft range and plays for up to 6 hours. Take off the hanging chains and turn over the lantern to make into a tabletop musical light show. The speaker is easily removable, rechargeable and includes a USB charger. Individually packed in a beautiful color box and makes a great gift! Any variations in finish, or color reflect the handcrafted nature of our products.
